fields.perkEffect: +2 Soak against projectile weapon types.
+3 inches to single main weapon system range.
+6 to base movement for one action per game.
Mecha can make a jump as a single move action up to its base move. Can face any direction after jump. -2 to shoot rolls after jump.
+2 Soak against energy weapon types.
On activation use one action to repair D3+1 damage.
+1 to base Guard statistic against assault attacks.
+1 Soak against all weapon types.
+1 Guard against ranged attacks only.
Negates +2 Guard bonus normally given to flying units that are moving.
+1 to ranged attack with main weapon system.
+2 Guard against incoming missile fire for all units within twice the vehicles skill statistic. System is disabled if Tek suffers a critical. Vehicle can not take a main weapon system.
+1 to base move
On a critical hit roll (double six) when Assaulting, one enemy grunt is automatically swallowed and killed.  Remove the model from play, they can not be healed. This works against living targets o
Dread causes Gruntz units within the Skill in inches of this model to make an immediate Mental check or enter Condition Brown.
Select a main weapons from one size class larger than the vehicle. Base speed is reduced by -2"
+2 Guard statistic versus directly targeted incoming missile and rocket fire. System is  disabled if Tek suffers a critical.
Anti infantry weapons with the Full Auto ability can be fired without the -1 to the Shoot or Skill roll.
See page 89.
Non-Grav model is not affected by rough terrain. -2" reduced base speed at all times.
2 transported grunts can fire from each side arc of the vehicle at a -1 to Shoot or -2 to Shoot if the vehicle is moving.
-2 to base move statistic
Once per game the vehicle can use one action to deploy a smoke screen. The vehicle can fire on the turn it deploys the screen.
-2 from vehicle Soak and grunts transported can fire from the vehicle. A  -2 modifier is applied to their Shoot skill if the vehicle has moved this turn. The grunts unit can be targeted separately
Use one action to create a fear inducing  display or sound to nearby Gruntz  causing them to make a Condition Brown check. See page 90.
All infantry totally within an 8 inch area effect surrounding the vehicle are auto hit and suffer a damage roll of 8+2D6.
-1 to base Soak statistic and +1 to base move statistic.
